verses.verse: Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> wise <S%G3097>men<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> saying,

<S%G4226>"Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> who <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5088>born<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G395>east,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"
<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5015>it,<s%> he was troubled, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G4863>Gathering<s%> <S%G2532>together<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> he <S%G4441>asked<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> would be <S%G1080>born.<s%>

<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1722>"In<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%>

<S%G4771><s%> 'You <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah,<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> in <S%G3760>no<s%> way <S%G1646>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2232>princes<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2448>Judah:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> shall <S%G1831>come<s%> forth a <S%G2233>governor,<s%> who shall shepherd <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>'"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G2977>secretly<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the wise <S%G3097>men,<s%> and <S%G198>learned<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G198>exactly<s%> what <S%G5550>time<s%> the <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G5316>appeared.<s%>

He <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G1833>search<s%> <S%G199>diligently<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> the young <S%G3813>child.<s%> <S%G1875>When<s%> you have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G518>him,<s%> bring <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3704>word,<s%> so that <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G1161>They,<s%> having <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> their <S%G2532>way;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G792>star,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G395>east,<s%> went <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2258>was.<s%>
<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G792>star,<s%> they <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> with <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy.<s%>

They <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>saw<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G455>Opening<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2344>treasures,<s%> they <S%G4374>offered<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1435>gifts:<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G3030>frankincense,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4666>myrrh.<s%>

<S%G2532>Being<s%> warned <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%> that <S%G344>they<s%> <S%G3361>shouldn't<s%> <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> they <S%G402>went<s%> back <S%G4314>to<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3598>way.<s%>

Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> had <S%G402>departed,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1453>"Arise<s%> and <S%G3880>take<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2468>stay<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

He <S%G1453>arose<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> by <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5054>death<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> I <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the wise <S%G3097>men,<s%> <S%G2373>was<s%> <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G2373>angry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sent <S%G649>out,<s%> and <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the male <S%G3816>children<s%> who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3725>surrounding<s%> <S%G846>countryside,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> two years <S%G1332>old<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2736>under,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the exact <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had <S%G198>learned<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the wise <S%G3097>men.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> that which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

"A <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G191>was<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4471>Ramah,<s%> <S%G2355>lamentation,<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3602>mourning,<s%> <S%G4478>Rachel<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> for <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children;<s%> <S%G2309>she<s%> <S%G3756>wouldn't<s%> be <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> no <S%G3756>more.<s%>"

But <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G5053>dead,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> saying,

<S%G1453>"Arise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3880>take<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> those who <S%G2212>sought<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%>'s <S%G5590>life<s%> are <S%G2348>dead.<s%>"

He <S%G1453>arose<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> the young <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G745>Archelaus<s%> was <S%G936>reigning<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the place <S%G473>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> he was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%> <S%G1161>Being<s%> warned <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> he <S%G402>withdrew<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>region<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>lived<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth;<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3754>prophets:<s%> "He will be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3480>Nazarene.<s%>"
